idea: Online platform to connect all stamp paper vendors and Notary Public on digital platform to avail the required stamp papers and notary services at the common man's doorstep which save productive time, money, health and various laborious efforts. This platform also prevent malpractices in Stamp Vending process viz. black marketing, stock holding, accounting anarchy and tax evasion. If the Government adopts this platform it will save paper work, processing time, stationary and most importantly the environment.
name: DRAFT BOX SOLUTIONS LLP

idea:
To, 
"Startup India Hub" of the Department of Industrial Policy &
Promotion(DIPP), Ministry of Commerce, Government of India.

SUB: Application for Startup company as a BANK AGGREGATOR.

Dear Sir / Madam,
Greetings from Bank Group !!!
A brief description from Bank Group.
Bank Group was formed in 2012. Being an ex-banker with HSBC as VP IT Operations in Mumbai having 20yrs experience, have ventured in and since then have been tied-up with State Bank Of India.
We are BC (Code: 56F4) with State Bank Of Indian into Financial Inclusion sector doing remittance, account opening, FD, RD, loans etc. Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana, Mudra Loan Yojana, Atal Pension Yojana, etc. And moving towards Micro Finance Business.
 We are actively looking for Local as well as International Donors to Promote us in this sector to server the Socially and Economically weaker section of people, both in Urban as well as Rural India. We have formed Bachat Gat and have enrolled SHG with State Bank Of India attached to Mahim Branch and awaiting loan sanction for 17 SHG in Mumbai. We have also tie-ups with local political women wings and religious women group Hindus and Muslims population. And another 125 SHG are ready to enroll.
We have also tied-up with multiple Banks, NBFCs, Private Financing companies for Home loan, Personal loan, Mortgage loans, Business Project Finance, as well as construction projects.
My goal is to transit our enthusiasm, creativity and experience into business, where we continue to provide the strategic and tactical leadership critical to retaining valued customers of our organization. We are certain that our presence in your team will prove to be beneficial to your organization. As such, I would welcome an opportunity to speak with you to evaluate your needs and share my ideas.
Kindly consider my application enclosed for Startup as Bank Aggregator by providing Banking and Financial service at Customers Door step.

Thanking You,
For Bank Group,
Surajit Kanungo
9892074091, 7208014275
email: contactus@bankgroupinfo.in
name: BANK GROUP

idea: The best way to use this is to adopt a soil testing methodology to identify the actual need of soil along with within-field crop monitoring. The methodology of a soil test is low-cost solutions for testing soil and based on the specific sample test of soil to ascertain the most effective treatment of the soil for the purpose of providing plant nutrition, further to alter the seed by way of treating the same adopting inexpensive seed-treatments, plant growth hormones, and foliar options.
